title: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in the Java editor.
description: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in the Java editor.
OB: When answering "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog, and then double-clicking on the file in the navigator to reopen it, the contents of the window are replaced with the original almost instantly. However, if I repeat the previous steps and then select "Revert" from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
EB: When selecting "Revert" from the pop-up menu in the editor, it should replace the contents of the window with the original almost instantly, similar to how closing and reopening the file does.
SR:
1. Answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog.
2. Double-click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2.
4. Select "Revert" from the pop-up menu in the editor.
